thread.title: This spy is well worth catching
thread.title_full: This spy is well worth catching

title: This spy is well worth catching
text:
false false Not to be missed ... The incredibly potent chemistry between Tom Hanks’ character James B. Donovan and that of Mark Rylance’s Rudolf Abel. Picture: Jaap Buitendijk / DreamWorks Pictures / Fox 2000 Pictures via AP Beautiful cinematography ... Hanks, Amy Ryan, and Alan Alda, right, in a scene from Bridge of Spies. Picture: Jaap Buitendijk / DreamWorks Pictures / Fox 2000 Pictures via AP 1 of n 
Rating: 4/5 
Finding new heat in an old Cold War 
STEVEN Spielberg has many strengths, as both a master filmmaker and populist storyteller. His latest work, Bridge Of Spies , draws directly upon a rare ability for which he will be remembered for a long time to come. Other Stories
